Antes dessa plataforma eu passava horas: Before finding this platform i wasted hours to find a place where i could eat safety. Nowadays i can save alot of time.
Com certeza usarei o site novamente para: Certanly, i will utilize this site again to discover news places and recommend to my pals
Finalmente posso sair para comer sem med: Finally, I can go out to eat without fear. I recommend it to everyone with dietary restrictions.
A plataforma oferece ótimas opções de re: The platform offers great options for restaurants that meet my specific dietary needs. This has been a tremendous help.
Pude pesquisar restaurantes por tipo de: I was able to search for restaurants by allergy type and location, which made our choice much easier.
Nossa plataforma de geolocalização de re: Our platform geolocalizes restaurants that offers an incluse and safe experience, with diversity and delivery, ensuring client safety.
Conectamos clientes com restrições alime: We connect clients with food restrictions to restaurants with safe and delicious food.
Respeito, integridade, inclusão, seguran: Resprect, integrity, inclusiveness, safety and transparency.
ODS 2 - Fome Zero e Agricultura Sustentá: SDG 2 - Zero Hunger and Sustainable Agriculture: By providing means for people with dietary restrictions to find adequate food more easily, the project indirectly contributes to the fight against hunger and promotes a more sustainable approach in food production and distribution
ODS 3 - Saúde e Bem-Estar: O projeto vis: SDG 3 - Health and Welfare: The project aims to facilitate the lives of people with food restrictions, ensuring that they have access to safe food and appropriate to their needs, which is directly linked to the promotion of health and well-being.
ODS 12 - Consumo e Produção Responsáveis: SDG 12 - Responsible Consumption and Production: By helping people make more conscious and safe food choices, the project promotes responsible consumption and encourages more sustainable practices in the food industry.
A SaborIA é uma plataforma de geolocaliz: SaborIA is a geolocalization platform visioning the inclusion of people with food restrictions in a simple manner
Com nossa plataforma, a vida de pessoas: With our platform, the burden of the people with food restrictions,that is, allergies and intolerance, is eased. Therefore, you feel safer eating your favorite food
Representa o sabor da comida: Represents the flavor of the food
Com quais restrições alimentares vocês t: Which dietary restrictions do you work with?
Nós trabalhamos com leite, peixes, ovos,: We work with milk, fish, eggs, nuts, wheat, peanuts, and shrimp.
Como faço para procurar um restaurante?: How do I search for a restaurant?
Na tela inicial possuímos a aba restaura: On the home screen, we have a restaurant tab. There you can search by allergy or dish.
Vocês possuem serviço delivery?: Do you have a delivery service?
Nós não realizamos a entrega de pedidos,: We do not deliver orders, but our restaurants offer delivery services.
Como eu faço para criar uma conta?: How do I create an account?
Na tela de login, clique em “Criar conta: On the login screen, click 'Create account'. We will need an email and a password for registration.
No momento, a Saboria está atuando somen: Currently, Saboria is operating only in the São Paulo region.
Esqueci minha senha, o que eu faço?: I forgot my password, what do I do?
Na tela de login clique em “Esqueceu sua: On the login screen, click 'Forgot your password?' for us to send a confirmation and generate a new password.
Envie sua dúvida para nosso email sabori: Send your question to our email saboriaoficial@gmail.com so we can resolve your doubt.
Fundada no primeiro semestre de 2023 por: Founded in the first half of 2023 by students from the Proa Institute, NutriAcess is a platform aimed at democratizing nutritional consultations at social prices, committed to offering accessible and quality service to all our patients.
